about.title: About me
about.intro: Sup! If you're reading this, you're interested in the person behind the code. I'm Eugene (**thejenja**), a web developer focused on **Vue** and **UI Design**. I believe technology should serve aesthetics, not the other way around.
about.approach: My approach is **conscious architecture**. I'm not a fan of Tailwind or blindly using utility classes. Why? My experience building **UserCSS** (custom styles for existing sites) taught me that without semantic structure, maintaining code is a nightmare. That's why I choose **clean CSS/SCSS** and full control over my styles. I value neat, **hand-crafted layouts** where every selector makes sense and the UI remains flexible and lightweight.
about.interests: I live at the intersection of code and **AI**. For me, AI isn't a toy but a core tool: I use it to generate ideas, prototype layouts, create assets, and even refactor code. It lets me work as both a designer and a dev. Beyond web, I create **Lyrics videos** (visuals + music + motion) and have a background in **Minecraft** server administration. Yep, those blocks taught me about memory leaks and optimization long before it became my job.
about.conclusion: Bottom line: I'm a **CSS enthusiast** who uses **AI pipelines** to speed up workflows but never sacrifices the quality of hand-written code. I stand for **open-source**, bold visual experiments, and websites that evoke emotion. If you need more than just a coder—if you need a creative engineer—we'll get along perfectly.
